alert.note: Alert for Brazos; Burleson; Grimes; Madison; Montgomery; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 30 at 4:04AM CDT until March 30 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR AREAS MAINLY ALONG AND WEST OF A LINE FROM THE MADISONVILLE AREA TO THE HOUSTON AREA TO THE GALVESTON AREA... .Lowering relative humidities and elevated west winds this afternoon ahead of a cold front could produce conditions that may become favorable for any wildfire to quickly become uncontained...especially with grass fires. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR AREAS MAINLY ALONG AND WEST OF A LINE FROM THE MADISONVILLE AREA TO THE HOUSTON AREA TO THE GALVESTON AREA... The National Weather Service in Houston/Galveston has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED COUNTIES... Madison...Walker...Burleson...Brazos... Grimes...Montgomery. * TIMING...1 PM to 7 PM today * WIND...West 15 to 20 mph and gusty * HUMIDITY...Between 15 and 25 percent * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create explosive fire growth potential.

area.areaDesc: Brazos; Burleson; Grimes; Madison; Montgomery; Walker
